title: Introducing: Maria Kelly
body:
Photo :: [Deborah Sheedy](https://www.

facebook.com/DeborahSheedyPhotography/) _Black & Blue_, the second track from **Maria Kelly** released earlier this year showcased her delicate, deeply emotive songwriting, with a stunning vocal that puts her well above many of her contemporaries. Her follow-up offering, _Stitches_, feels more confident, whilst maintaining elements of the fragility that makes her songwriting so appealing. Check out both tracks below. _I will wait for you / like I always do_ Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.

Her follow-up offering, Stitches, feels more confident, whilst maintaining elements of the fragility that makes her songwriting so appealing. \[…\]
